cluster_description: Requirements related to the effectiveness of speech-based interaction. This includes speech recognition accuracy, language support, and clarity of vocal output.
Requirements addressing the system's ability to understand context and provide relevant support. These include proactive suggestions, remembering preferences, and adaptive dialogue.

Requirements ensuring users have full autonomy in initiating, pausing, and managing interactions with ALFRED. Covers push-to-talk models, avoidance of unsolicited prompts, and explicit consent mechanisms.
